title: Activity-Based Patient Safety Education: Enhancing Practical Competencies via Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of healthcare system fundamentals and patient safety principles
context.additional_context: Small-group activities and case-based learning environments for current medical practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more systemic error factors in complex medical scenarios.
Learners can predict and respond to patient safety risks with over 80% accuracy through activity-based simulations.
Learners can apply interdisciplinary collaboration strategies to develop and evaluate case-specific improvement plans.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
